movies.title: Kingdom of Heaven
movies.plot: Jesus uses a series of short stories, parables, to help us learn about the Kingdom of Heaven and about how to live each day. Eternal life, faith, judgment, obedience and preparedness are the principles explored in this video. The Kingdom of Heaven begins with Jesus in the clouds and angels in the background. There are people from different times and different races looking into the clouds and seeing Jesus. Jesus begins to speak to the people about the Kingdom of Heaven and how the treatment of others is the same as actions toward Him. Slowly, Jesus' shining garment is traded for an earthly robe and He is preaching to a gathering of people. Two Pharisees watch and listen. Boaz, one of the Pharisees, is angered by what he hears Jesus saying and the other Jeremiah is intrigued. David and Sarah, brother and sister, listen also. Boaz says that all Jesus does is tell silly stories. Jeremiah tries to explain that perhaps Jesus wants everyone to discover the meaning from the stories. Sarah ...

biography.bio: Ivan Crosland was born on August 29, 1936. He was an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), The ButterCream Gang (1992) and Brigham City (2001). He died on March 26, 2015 in Provo, Utah, USA.
biography.name: Ivan Crosland

biography.bio: John Nicolaysen is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), The Joseph Smith Story (1988) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: John Nicolaysen

biography.bio: Linda Bishop is known for her work on Big Eyes (2014), Will There Really Be a Morning? (1983) and Cagney & Lacey (1981).
biography.name: Linda Bishop

biography.bio: James Arrington was born on December 17, 1948 as James Wesley Arrington. He is an actor, known for The Swan Princess (1994), The Swan Princess: Escape from Castle Mountain (1997) and The Swan Princess Christmas (2012).
biography.name: James Arrington

biography.bio: Terri Purles is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Terri Purles

biography.bio: Kim Blackett is an actor, known for The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Kim Blackett

biography.bio: Alan Nash is an actor, known for The Mailbox (1977), Child Bride of Short Creek (1981) and Evil in Clear River (1988).
biography.name: Alan Nash

biography.bio: Gerry Graves is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Gerry Graves

biography.bio: Tony Larimer was born on April 18, 1929 in Evanston, Illinois, USA as Emmet Larimer. He was an actor, known for The Crow 3 - Salvation (2000), I Saw Mommy Kissing Santa Claus (2002) and It Is Fine! Everything Is Fine. (2007). He was married to Marie C. Larimer and Mary Elizabeth. He died on March 10, 2009 in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA.
biography.name: Tony Larimer

biography.bio: Susan Doupé is an actress, known for Eight Lanes in Hamilton (1999), This Is the Disk-O-Boyz (1999) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Susan Doupé

biography.bio: Jayne Luke is an actress, known for Species (1995), Silent Night, Deadly Night (1984) and Brigham City (2001).
biography.name: Jayne Luke

biography.bio: Shiland McCall is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Shiland McCall

biography.bio: Paul Nichols is an actor, known for The Joseph Smith Story (1988), The Returning (1983) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Paul Nichols

biography.bio: Jack Whitaker was born on May 18, 1924. He is an actor and producer, known for 1971 NFL Pro Bowl (1971), AFL-NFL World Championship Game (1967) and Hot to Trot (1988). He was previously married to Nancy Chaffee.
biography.name: Jack Whitaker
